elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Describe an example person and a possible contract situation for each group of people.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Persons capable of acting
elements.correctAnswer:
Individual answers.
Example: I have reached the age of 18 - I am therefore capable of judgment and of legal age - and I am getting a credit card.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Persons with limited legal capacity
elements.correctAnswer:
Individual answers.
Example: My sister is 16 years old - therefore capable of judgment, but not yet of legal age - and she can buy a nice dress with her pocket money.

elements.name: question15
elements.title: Persons incapable of acting
elements.correctAnswer:
Individual answers.
Example: Benno is 7 years old and therefore neither capable of judgment nor of legal age; he cannot conclude contracts independently.
